title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, what does the error message mean?
SR: To reproduce the issue: - Open a binary project - Select a class or package from the project - Press F4
